query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `projectSecrets` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `projectId` INT NOT NULL,
  `category` ENUM('database', 'hosting', 'smtp', 'api', 'ftp', 'other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'other',
  `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `value` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `isVisible` BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `idx_projectSecrets_projectId` (`projectId`)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user ocAJesqVvSPKcLA.8e21e7f2c662 --database 5evvQHYxZbgpbBkTD2rF9K --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `projectSecrets` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `projectId` INT NOT NULL,
  `category` ENUM('database', 'hosting', 'smtp', 'api', 'ftp', 'other') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'other',
  `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  `value` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `isVisible` BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX `idx_projectSecrets_projectId` (`projectId`)
);
